translation: Having seen Your immeasurable form with many mouths and eyes, O mighty-armed one, with many arms, thighs, and feet, with many stomachs and fearsome with many teeth, the worlds are terrified, and so am I.
commentary: 11.23 Form form? Expensive immeasurable? And Thy? Bahuvaktranetram with many mouths and eyes? Mightyarmed O,mightyarmed? Bahubahurupadam with many arms? thighs and feet? Bahudaram with many stomachs. fearful with many teeth? seeing having seen? Lokas the worlds? Pravyathitah are terrified? And also? I am I.Commentary Lokah The worlds -- all living beings in the world. Here is the cause of my fear. Arjuna describes below the nature of the Cosmic Form which has caused terror in his heart.
